channel.title: Wallpapers - Showoff what you've made
channel.description:
All wallpapers I make will be made in 1080p to me. The colors may not be soo bright for you, and are possibly higher than your computers resolution. Post any that you have made, but please do not post a small 800x600 image.
This one I originally captured a screenshot of the landscape. After some tinkering in photoshop I decided to add a creeper, and a "boom" effect around him. Link: http://i51.tinypic.com/2rojozd.png
